TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed JournalOwnership extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether a uses its own journal. JournalOwnership is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When JournalOwnership is Automatic, the following behavior applies:
- The hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> behaves as though UsesParentJournal was set if it is hosted by either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> or a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
- The hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> behaves as though OwnsJournal was set if:
- It is not directly hosted by either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
- It is hosted by at least one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, where each containing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property is set to UsesParentJournal.
> [!NOTE] > once a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> creates its own journal, switching to Automatic has no effect.
## Examples The following example illustrates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> yielding journal management to a host <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
[!code-xml[FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample#SetJournalOwnershipProperty](../../add/codesnippet/Xaml/FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample.XAML/HomePage.xaml#setjournalownershipproperty)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership Automatic = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership OwnsJournal = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership UsesParentJournal = int32(2)
